Indicates if a Flag grants authorization to the user.

Parameters:
flag -
Returns:
True, if the flag.isUp is true.

hideCrudButtons

public static <B extends Serializable> void hideCrudButtons(CrudPickerPanel<B> cpp)
Hides the new, edit and delete buttons of a CrudPickerPanel. This is useful when a nested crud picker panel in view mode must be able to show its beans, but not perform any CRUD operations on them.

Type Parameters:
B - Type of panel bean.
Parameters:
cpp - CrudPickerPanel

hideCrudButtons

public static <B extends Serializable> void hideCrudButtons(CrudPickerPanel<B> cpp,
                                                            PanelCreatorMode... modes)
Hides the specified CRUD buttons of a CrudPickerPanel. This is useful when a nested crud picker panel in view mode must be able to show its beans, but not perform some CRUD operations on them.

Type Parameters:
B - Type of panel bean.
Parameters:
cpp - CrudPickerPanel
modes - Modes for which to hide buttons.

hideCrudButtons

                                                            String... buttonWicketIds)
Hides the specified CRUD buttons of a CrudPickerPanel. This is useful when a nested crud picker panel in view mode must be able to show its beans, but not perform some CRUD operations on them.

Type Parameters:
B - Type of panel bean.
Parameters:
cpp - CrudPickerPanel
buttonWicketIds - for which to hide buttons

disableCrudButtons

public static <B extends Serializable> void disableCrudButtons(CrudPickerPanel<B> cpp)
Disables the new, edit and delete buttons of a CrudPickerPanel. This is useful when a nested crud picker panel in view mode must be able to show its beans, but not perform any CRUD operations on them.

disableCrudButtons

                                                               String... buttonWicketIds)
Disables the specified CRUD buttons of a CrudPickerPanel. This is useful when a nested crud picker panel in view mode must be able to show its beans, but not perform some CRUD operations on them.

Type Parameters:
B - Type of panel bean.
Parameters:
cpp - CrudPickerPanel
buttonWicketIds - Wickets ids of the buttons to disable.

getFieldsPanel

public static <B extends Serializable> org.apache.wicket.Component getFieldsPanel(CrudPickerPanel<B> cpp)
Gets the form fields panel of the SingleBeanPanel of a CrudPickerPanel. You may invoke this in cases you know that the SingleBeanPanel is rendered, for example in save or update action implementation.

Type Parameters:
B - Type of bean.
Parameters:
cpp -
Returns:
The form fields panel (showing a B) of the SingleBeanPanel of the CrudPickerPanel.
